COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: It was a quiet Natale morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: At the last minute, it was decided that Torta would be
my partner, and I'd been neglecting practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: Torta had all sorts of errands of her own, which was the
saving grace of this arrangement.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, you're awake. This is early for you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: [Phorni] “Arie isn't coming, right? And you're still waking
up early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: I looked at the clock, it was only eight o' clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248
STRING: Every year, Arie would take the overnight train that
arrived around this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: Perhaps I'd become used to that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a
STRING: After become a third year, I started waking up at times
that I'd never thought possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x280
STRING: [Chris] “...It just happened. I can just go back to sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2
STRING: [Phorni] “Here we go again. You're already awake, why
not play the Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: Phorni spoke so cheerfully, it sounded like she was
joking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: Perhaps she was trying to console someone who'd be
spending Natale by himself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: ... When I got up to get a drink, suddenly there was a
knock on the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312
STRING: [Chris] “...Who could that be?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x344
STRING: [Phorni] “No idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: [Chris] “Hold on a sec!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x372
STRING: I spoke loudly so I could be heard through the door,
and after I hurriedly changed, I opened the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390
STRING: [Chris] “Good mor...ning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c4
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: [Arie] “I'm here... Are you surprised?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x414
STRING: [Chris] “...Arietta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x446
STRING: [Arie] “Did you forget because it's been a whole year?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c
STRING: [Chris] “O-Of course not! But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48e
STRING: [Arie] “I said in the letter that I couldn't make it, but I
put in extra work,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: and on the last day they let me take time off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d2
STRING: [Chris] “R-Really? That's... That's great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x504
STRING: [Arie] “This is all very sudden, but I hope you're free...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a
STRING: [Chris] “Of course. I was just wondering how to spend
the day alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: [Arie] “I see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x584
STRING: That's good... I was worried about imposing on you,
Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59a
STRING: [Chris] “It's fine, I'm really glad to see you. Come in, it's
cold outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Arie] “Yes it is, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d8
STRING: Arie looked cold as we stood in the doorway, so I let
her in and we continued talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60a
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh? ... I thought she wasn't coming?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x620
STRING: [Chris] “Arie, here, use this towel.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x636
STRING: I tossed a brand new towel to Arie, who caught it a
little awkwardly and started drying her damp hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: Meanwhile, I brought Phorni close to my face and
explained.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x666
STRING: [Chris] “She put in extra work and managed to take
time off. That's why she came to see me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: Phorni sounded a little surprised, and then she made a
rather solemn face, for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Phorni] “You look really pleased. In that case, I'll make
myself invisible today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72a
STRING: [Arie] “Thanks, Chris. Where should I put this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x740
STRING: [Chris] “...Ah, just put it in that basket. The laundry's
piling up, but I'll do it tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x772
STRING: As I was replying to Arie's question, Phorni disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: I wanted to talk to her a while longer, because I spend
Natale with Arie every year, and Phorni was always
looking out for me in a similar way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: Anyway, I had lots of free time until school started
again, so we'd do plenty of ensembles after today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7be
STRING: I also had time off from Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: [Arie] “Ah, that's quite the pile...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x814
STRING: Is it okay if I do the laundry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: [Chris] “...It's okay, I can do that for myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x852
STRING: [Arie] “Nuh uh. You just woke up, didn't you? Why don't
you take a shower and freshen up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x872
STRING: [Chris] “...You can tell, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x890
STRING: [Arie] “Go on, shower and then we can start the day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a6
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: Arie didn't come across as pushy in the way she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: But somehow, I always found myself obeying her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8de
STRING: Maybe that's how much I liked her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: [Chris] “But... Are you really going to do the laundry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, because I like to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x932
STRING: The way Arie said it, it almost sounded like she meant
to say “you” instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x948
STRING: She lifted the basket, and then smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: [Chris] “...What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x986
STRING: [Arie] “It smells like you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99c
STRING: [Chris] “Hey!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ce
STRING: [Arie] “Ha-ha, don't forget your towel.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f6
STRING: Arie tossed off that sappy comment before going down
the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: Built for students, my room didn't have space for a
washing machine, or to dry my clothes, even.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2c
STRING: Instead, there was a communal washing machine and a
dryer at the end of the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa42
STRING: The first time Arie came here two years ago, I think she
did my laundry as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa58
STRING: That was just embarrassing, so last year I made sure to
do the laundry before Natale, but this year...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6e
STRING: She'd arrived without warning, so I didn't have a choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: But I was happy, and my face broke into a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa86
STRING: As reminded, I placed a towel in front of the shower
room door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: To make myself fully awake, I turned on the hot water,
full blast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: As I stood under the water, many things went through
my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae0
STRING: What we would do today, for example, and what we
would eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf6
STRING: I think I cooked for two years ago, and last year we
definitely ate out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0c
STRING: Perhaps I'd get to taste Arie's cooking this year?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb18
STRING: Come to think of it, I hadn't tasted her cooking in three
years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: I lost myself in such happy thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: As I got out of the shower, I felt Arie's presence in the
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: [Chris] “Arie! I'm coming out now, turn around for a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: I got out of the shower and dried myself with the towel
I'd laid out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc2
STRING: I'd just changed, so I put on the clothes from before and
returned to the room while drying my hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd8
STRING: [Chris] “All done. Are you hungry, Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0a
STRING: [Arie] “Not really, I had a packed meal on the train. You
haven't eaten yet, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2a
STRING: [Chris] “Not yet. But I'm not that hungry, I can wait until
lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc66
STRING: [Arie] “That won't do. If you don't eat something, then
you won't be able to pray properly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: [Arie] “Besides, the laundry has to be put into the dryer.
Nothing will dry in this endless rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc2
STRING: Arie presented an array of reasons for me to eat
breakfast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf2
STRING: Somehow I must have sensed that Arie would say those
things, because my body was already moving.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd08
STRING: I made espresso for Arie, and prepared rusks and some
other stuff for myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1e
STRING: When it was all ready, both of us relaxed, and it felt like
any other Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd34
STRING: [Chris] “After we eat, do you want to go to church?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd66
STRING: [Arie] “Yes. After that let's walk around the city, and
then I want to hear you play the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, I'll play to your heart's content.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: [Arie] “Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: Somehow, naturally, we were already holding hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0e
STRING: We didn't say anything, it just happened without us
realizing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1a
STRING: With Arie standing in front of me like this, the distance
that had separated us, the time spent apart-it felt like
they'd never existed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: It was past eight in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeec
STRING: I was standing in front of the station, waiting for Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef8
STRING: Thankfully the rain was light, and if I stood under the
roof, it didn't feel that cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: I wasn't a morning person, but every year, on this day
alone, I'd wake up even without Phorni's help.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf24
STRING: [Chris] “Any time now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3a
STRING: I looked at the clock one more time, listening out for
the sounds of the train from the distant platform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf50
STRING: Waiting for people wasn't that hard, in fact, I kind of
enjoyed it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf66
STRING: The thought of someone I liked coming to see me, that
alone made me happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: In the end, I was pairing up with Torta for the
graduation recital, but that wouldn't change anything
with Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf92
STRING: Of course, Torta and I would practice hard so we could
graduate, but I felt that she wouldn't change, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd6
STRING: [Arie] “Sorry to keep you waiting!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: Arie came running out of the station.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff8
STRING: [Chris] “Morning. Here, let me take that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100e
STRING: I rushed to meet her and carry her bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: It only contained clothes for a day trip, so it wasn't that
heavy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: Even so, I took it from Arie, and she passed it to me
with a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: [Arie] “It's okay, I'm not that tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1090
STRING: I'm used to the night train, and I even managed to get
some sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a6
STRING: [Chris] “I see. But, I'm sorry that you always have to
come all the way here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e2
STRING: [Arie] “It's nothing. Besides, I came because I wanted to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f8
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Anyway, you must be cold, how about
we find somewhere to have a warm drink?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1120
STRING: [Arie] “Before that, let's go to church, as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1136
STRING: [Chris] “Fine, fine. You're so serious, Arie. I'm not that
pious, so we'll balance each other out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Arie] “I'm not pious, Chris. I want to go because I'm
with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1188
STRING: [Chris] “Is that right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119e
STRING: I felt my face turn red, thanks to Arie's sappiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: With a knowing, pleased look, Arie took my hand and
started walking toward the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: Perhaps it was because of the heater inside the train,
but Arie's hand was warm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f2
STRING: [Arie] “Your hand is so cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: Did you wait long?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: [Chris] “Not at all. My hands are just always cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: [Arie] “I see... Then your heart must be very warm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128a
STRING: Arie returned my silly comment with a joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1300
STRING: [Arie] “There aren't many people out at this time, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1316
STRING: We were walking in the New District when Arie made
that observation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1322
STRING: [Chris] “Is that so? I was always with you, Arie, so I
never paid much attention...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135e
STRING: [Arie] “Was it last year?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138c
STRING: My father went to church in the afternoon, and he
complained that there were so many people, he wasn't
able to receive a blessing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: [Arie] “At this time, it's probably the same wherever you
go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13de
STRING: [Chris] “Come to think of it, this city hasn't changed
much either, has it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: [Arie] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: The Mass during Natale was different to those held on
other holidays, as all the church doors were opened
wide so that as many people as possible could attend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: The ceremony itself was quite unceremonious. Priests
didn't read from the teachings, and neither bread nor
wine was given out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: I'd heard that it had to be that way, in order for more
people to attend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1472
STRING: With lapsed believers such as me who only went to
church on this day, you bet it had to be that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1488
STRING: It was the same scene that you saw every year at
Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: [Chris] “But there's one difference...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c6
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14dc
STRING: I focused on listening.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: From a distance, the voices of the choir rode the wind
and resounded through the air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1520
STRING: [Arie] “You're right... I can hear them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154a
STRING: The church in this city was always filled with the sound
of hymns.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1556
STRING: As you'd expect of the city of music, the choir was very
talented.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156c
STRING: The splendor of their voices was enough to place the
awe of God in the minds of those who heard them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1584
STRING: Even if you weren't a vocal specialist, you'd feel it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1592
STRING: In the first place, music was something for the people,
not concepts to be debated and fussed over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b2
STRING: Whether you were a famous musician or an ordinary
citizen, as long as you were moved by music, it was all
the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: Music was the enjoyment of sound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d6
STRING: The teacher at the music school we used to attend
would repeat that like a mantra.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1612
STRING: [Arie] “What beautiful voices.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x163c
STRING: Arie closed her eyes and listened, as if she were about
to burst into song herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1654
STRING: It seemed she was actually going to start singing, when
she suddenly opened her eyes and looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a0
STRING: [Arie] “...What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing, it just looked like you were about to
start singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: I intended it sincerely, but Arie seemed to take it as a
joke, sticking her tongue out at me and frowning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: [Arie] “I'm not going to sing. I know you'll just make fun
of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: [Chris] “No I won't...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172a
STRING: That was my reply, but then I imagined Arie actually
singing, and I wasn't so sure any more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175c
STRING: [Arie] “Hey... You're thinking mean things, aren't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1772
STRING: [Chris] “O-Of course not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a4
STRING: [Arie] “Don't think I can't tell. So you were going to
laugh at me after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c4
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1804
STRING: [Chris] “As if.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1836
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184c
STRING: Arie started to get angry for one moment, and then she
laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: We weren't being particularly funny.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: It was just that being able to spend time like this
together made us so happy, we could've laughed all
day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d6
STRING: When we got to the church, there was already quite a
large crowd.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e2
STRING: The sound of the hymns was so loud now we could
even hear the lyrics.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f8
STRING: We joined the line that led to the entrance, and waited.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1916
STRING: [Arie] “At this rate, it'll take half an hour or so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192c
STRING: [Chris] “It's the same every year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: There was no Mass held today, but by waiting in line,
you could receive a blessing from the Father.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: The church was also open to the public, so one could
just go right in and start praying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196e
STRING: But it was normal to wait, in a line that stretched
outside depending on the time of day, for a blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1984
STRING: For two years ——— no, three years in a row, we'd
waited in line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199a
STRING: [Chris] “After our prayers, what do you want to do? I
wonder if anywhere is open for lunch...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e6
STRING: [Arie] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fc
STRING: I was looking at the line, and Arie, who took a while to
respond, was beside me with her eyes closed, for some
reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1c
STRING: [Chris] “I said, what do you want to do after this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4e
STRING: [Arie] “Ah, sorry. I wasn't listening...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a64
STRING: [Chris] “That's okay. What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a82
STRING: [Arie] “I hear them every year, but this choir is really
talented.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a98
STRING: [Chris] “That goes without saying. I'm not sure, but they
probably get professionals to do it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad4
STRING: [Arie] “Nuh uh. Don't you know about the students from
your own school?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aea
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? ... You mean, Piova?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1c
STRING: [Arie] “Yes. Torta told me in her letter; apparently they
ask for volunteers every year. Meals provided, even.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b46
STRING: [Chris] “Do you think Torta would join them?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b64
STRING: [Arie] “No, I don't think so. She seems to be busy with
something else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b84
STRING: [Chris] “Aw, for a moment I could imagine Torta doing
something like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc0
STRING: [Arie] “...Perhaps. Anyway, I was just listening, and
thinking how talented they were.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be0
STRING: [Chris] “You've always liked to listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: [Arie] “Yes... What?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c40
STRING: Are you implying something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4c
STRING: [Chris] “Listening... To songs.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6a
STRING: [Arie] “...I know. Nothing wrong with just listening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c80
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, it's perfectly fine. That's more like you,
Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cbc
STRING: [Arie] “Wh-What do you mean, that's like me. Meanie...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd2
STRING: [Chris] “Including that, it's perfectly fine to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d04
STRING: [Arie] “Ugh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5c
STRING: There were large shells filled with holy water on either
side on the cathedral's entrance, and after dipping our
fingers, we made the sign of the cross.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d7c
STRING: It was customary, but I hadn't thought much about what
it meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d92
STRING: After taking just one step inside, we were surrounded
by song more fully than we could've imagined outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da8
STRING: Upon the distinctive sound of plain chant, those voices
seemed to stretch and fill the cathedral.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbe
STRING: It had a different mood compared to harmony, and
helped greatly to create a sense of mystery.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd4
STRING: Truth be told, I couldn't stand even the sight of those
winding notes, those neumes that came before five-line
staff notation, so that was all I knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df6
STRING: Arie closed her eyes again and basked in the sounds.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e02
STRING: Arie had always liked listening to music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: She never came to practice, but she'd always show up
for our little performances, and the three of us would
never miss the concerts that were held sometimes at
our town's small hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e30
STRING: That was probably thanks to Ninna's influence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3c
STRING: Ninna also liked music, but I'd heard that she focused
on listening because she wasn't much of a performer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e52
STRING: They'd lived together since Arie was a child, so it was a
possibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e68
STRING: But right now, I was starting to consider yet another
possibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8c
STRING: Me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e98
STRING: Maybe it was because of me that Arie came to the
performances, and grew to like music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb0
STRING: For a time-a really short period of time, Arie had tried to
distance herself from music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec6
STRING: It was when she saw that she wasn't really cut out to be
a singer, and Torta was improving rapidly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee6
STRING: I'd heard that she would cry and refuse to go to music
school, putting her parents in a tight spot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efe
STRING: Of course, I hadn't seen any of it with my own eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0a
STRING: It was just what my parents had told me afterward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f16
STRING: But I felt that I understood Arie's feelings, all too well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f24
STRING: In any case, Arie rarely came to practice after that, and
instead she'd bring handmade sweets and bread for us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f46
STRING: She'd listen to Torta and I practice, and lose herself in
the music, as she was doing now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8a
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm...? Ah, sorry. I got carried away...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa0
STRING: [Chris] “That's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb6
STRING: The memories of our childhood filled me with
tenderness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fde
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe... Oh, we're almost there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff4
STRING: Arie was looking at the front of the line, where the
Father placed his hand over the petitioners' heads and
mumbled something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200a
STRING: Over half of the people who received blessings
remained in the church, while the minority left directly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202a
STRING: Like Arie said, the line was moving, and soon we were
two, three groups away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2040
STRING: Then the old couple ahead of us moved to the side, and
we stepped forward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2078
STRING: We held our hands in prayer and lowered our heads,
whereupon the Father touched our heads and
whispered something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208e
STRING: It was in an old language, so I didn't understand the
actual meaning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x209a
STRING: But among the words were some that I'd heard before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b2
STRING: They must have been verses from the teachings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c0
STRING: I didn't mean to let the words slip by, but they weren't
staying in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d8
STRING: It had nothing to do with pious or impious thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ee
STRING: All I knew was that one minute a large hand was on my
head, and the next everything was over, as if nothing
had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2104
STRING: I peeked at Arie, her eyes were closed, and she was
quietly receiving the blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x211a
STRING: Perhaps it was the air in the church, but her profile was
beautiful, almost divine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2132
STRING: I was entranced by Arie's profile, which I hadn't seen in
a while, and before I knew it her blessing was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2170
STRING: I remembered where we were after the Father coughed
politely, and I met Arie's gaze.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2186
STRING: [Chris] “S-Sorry about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219c
STRING: We quickly moved to the side of the line, remaining
inside the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a8
STRING: We were going to pray next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c4
STRING: The whole idea of Mass was to offer prayers to reaffirm
our existence as “flesh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21da
STRING: Simply put, God existed only in “spirit”; humans could
not speak to God directly, nor even imagine him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f2
STRING: And, obsessed with things of the flesh, such as idols or
material wealth, many people would forget the “spirit”
within them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2214
STRING: The reaffirmation of one's existence and the confessing
of one's acts were the objectives of Mass.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222a
STRING: And it was the priest who acted as a bridge between
man and God, delivering our prayers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2240
STRING: So everyone went and prayed at church, where the
Father was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224e
STRING: On either side of the line, people were offering their
prayers, their eyes closed as if in meditation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2264
STRING: We did the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2270
STRING: And I reflected on the person I'd become.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x227e
STRING: In order to spend these hours with Arietta, I was here
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2294
STRING: As a result, perhaps I was neglecting my practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ac
STRING: But if my partner had been extra enthusiastic, I might've
lost even Natale to practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c2
STRING: I was sure that there were students practicing at that
very moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22da
STRING: But I valued, more than anything else, the time that I
was spending with Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f0
STRING: Even if I had hurt someone to be there, I had no regrets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2308
STRING: In the first place, the very thought that was something
to regret would be insulting to my partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x231e
STRING: I thought of Arie, then of another person who wasn't
here, and I opened my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2356
STRING: Just then, there was a break in the chant, and a
moment of silence descended.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2376
STRING: Arie had just opened her eyes too, and we looked at
each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a0
STRING: Then she smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e6
STRING: Outside, we saw that the line to get inside had grown
even longer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2420
STRING: [Arie] “Good thing we came when we did.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2436
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, if you hadn't come, Arie, I would never
have made it here at this time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x245e
STRING: [Arie] “You should wake up a little earlier, Chris. Well, I
should be glad that you're not late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247e
STRING: [Chris] “You have such high standards.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2494
STRING: While we were talking, Arie seemed to remember
something all of a sudden.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c6
STRING: [Arie] “That reminds me... When we were receiving the
Father's blessing, were you looking at me the whole
time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? ... Uh, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2504
STRING: [Arie] “You even caught a cough; what were you
thinking then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x251a
STRING: [Chris] “I was entranced, Arie, by your profile.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254c
STRING: [Arie] “Gah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2562
STRING: [Chris] “Ngh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2578
STRING: I answered way too honestly, which made us both
freeze up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258e
STRING: We were a couple, no doubt about that, but we hardly
ever whispered sweet nothings to each other, and in
fact we weren't too good at it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ae
STRING: There was no way to take back what I'd said, though,
not that I wanted to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c4
STRING: [Chris] “...That was embarrassing, but it's the truth. You
looked beautiful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2600
STRING: [Arie] “Is this... Asino's influence?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2616
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, no it's not. Asino and I are complete
opposites. Which may be why we get along, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: [Arie] “I see. But I never thought I'd hear such things
from your mouth, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2672
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I meant it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2688
STRING: We both turned red again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c0
STRING: For lunch, I made something simple at home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f4
STRING: The clothes in the dryer were done, so Arie took them
out and even folded them neatly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2710
STRING: It was natural for me to want to eat Arie's cooking
today, but if I didn't hear her say anything about dinner,
then perhaps it would take some other form.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x273a
STRING: In the restful time that followed lunch, I sat down in
front of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2750
STRING: Arie was really looking forward to it; she sat down too
and was all ears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278a
STRING: [Arie] “What are you going to play?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a0
STRING: [Chris] “How about, whatever comes to mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27be
STRING: [Arie] “As long as you're playing it for me, Chris,
anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d4
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks, well, in that case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ea
STRING: I knew Arie would say that, so I let my mind and fingers
wander.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2800
STRING: With an almost surprising lightness, I played the first
note.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x283c
STRING: It was a nostalgic song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2848
STRING: The song that came to mind was a simple one, the very
first one Arie, Torta and I learned to play at that music
school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286a
STRING: Arie was off-key.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2876
STRING: Torta was keeping up, somehow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2884
STRING: And I was desperately following the score with my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2890
STRING: It would've been more effective to practice different
songs for voice and Fortelle, but we'd insisted on
performing together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28b0
STRING: It wasn't a performance to be proud of, but after we'd
stumbled to the end, we laughed at ourselves and were
satisfied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28c8
STRING: It was an important memory, the very first song we
practiced, and even after all those years, my fingers
were almost moving by themselves.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e8
STRING: As I played the last note, I saw that Arie's eyes were
narrowed, as if in reminiscence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2900
STRING: And with a rapt look on her face, she expressed her
thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2932
STRING: [Arie] “That was the very first song we learned, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2948
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I suddenly remembered it, perhaps
because you're here, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2970
STRING: [Arie] “I miss those days. I wonder if I can still sing it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2986
STRING: [Chris] “Come on, try it. Who knows, you might even be
better now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c2
STRING: [Arie] “No way, you're definitely going to laugh at me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29d8
STRING: [Chris] “I won't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0a
STRING: [Arie] “You did, didn't you? When we were young.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a20
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha... No, I won't laugh any more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3e
STRING: [Arie] “Nuh uh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6c
STRING: Come on, I want to hear more of your Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a82
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind, of course, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab4
STRING: [Arie] “Somehow, I feel I'll get to know how you spent
those three unknown years if I hear you play, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ad4
STRING: [Chris] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aec
STRING: With that, I started playing the Fortelle again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af8
STRING: While looking at Arie, who had closed her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b04
STRING: While making the most of those precious hours.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b10
STRING: I could've kept playing the Fortelle forever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6c
STRING: [Arie] “Well then, I should start preparing dinner soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b82
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, at last.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b98
STRING: After playing for a couple of hours, it's no wonder parts
of my body were tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bae
STRING: Even though I didn't feel tired at all as I performed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc2
STRING: [Arie] “Three years, I guess?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I've made my own food up until now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0a
STRING: [Arie] “＊sigh＊ You must be really excited, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c20
STRING: [Chris] “I'm so looking forward to it. What are you
gonna make?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c52
STRING: [Arie] “Depends on what's in the fridge, but I was
thinking of parmigiana. If something's missing, I'll go buy
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c7c
STRING: [Chris] “I probably have the ingredients for that. I went
to the store before Natale, you see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cb8
STRING: [Arie] “Really? I'll go take a look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cee
STRING: Arie went to look at the fridge, and came back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d02
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, we have enough. Are you hungry? If so I can
start cooking now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d22
STRING: [Chris] “Of course. Parmigiana... I haven't had Ninna's in
a long time, either, this'll be great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4a
STRING: [Arie] “I learned how to make it from Grandma herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d78
STRING: It should be fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d8e
STRING: [Chris] “I know. I'm not worried about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc0
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, yes. You're only worried about my singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd6
STRING: [Chris] “You didn't have to go out of your way to say it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e08
STRING: [Arie] “I know what you're trying to say, Chris. Anyway,
your kitchen is mine for the next few hours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e28
STRING: [Chris] “Can I help?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e46
STRING: [Arie] “It's okay, you should rest. If you really must do
something... Play the song you're practicing with Torta
for graduation.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e78
STRING: [Arie] “It wasn't one of the songs you played just now,
was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8e
STRING: [Chris] “Good ears... You're right, I didn't play it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eca
STRING: [Arie] “Torta wrote the song, right? Then I'd recognize
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee0
STRING: [Chris] “So that's what it is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f12
STRING: [Arie] “By the way, I could probably recognize
something you wrote too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f28
STRING: [Chris] “I see. Well, I'm a bit tired, so I'll take a break. I'm
all practiced out for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f64
STRING: [Arie] “...That's certainly true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f7a
STRING: Arie smiled, rolling up her sleeves as she went into the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f92
STRING: I saw her go, then fell into bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f9e
STRING: Perhaps I overdid it, but all at once I felt fatigued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fbe
STRING: I closed my eyes, and while listening to the sounds of
the oven and of Arie cutting things up, before I knew it
I'd fallen asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fee
STRING: [Arie] “Rise and shine! Dinner's ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300c
STRING: [Arie] “...Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x303a
STRING: When I opened my eyes, Arie was just taking a dish out
of the oven.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3050
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... I'll get that. It's dangerous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308a
STRING: [Arie] “Handing it to you now would be more
dangerous. I've done this a lot more than you have,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30aa
STRING: Smiling, Arie carefully placed the dish on top of the
desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30dc
STRING: [Arie] “I'll bring over the rest of the dishes, try to be fully
awake by then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30fc
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3112
STRING: Even if I offered to help, she'd probably say no.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x311e
STRING: Besides, it was better for me to be fully awake, as Arie
said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3134
STRING: [Chris] “You could've woken me up a little earlier...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3170
STRING: [Arie] “But you were sleeping so soundly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3186
STRING: [Chris] “...Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31b8
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe, you're welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31ce
STRING: As I watched, all the food Arie had made was laid out
on the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31da
STRING: How long had it been since I had such a grand meal?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e6
STRING: It must've been... Since that time at Ninna's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31fc
STRING: [Chris] “Can we eat now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x322e
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, whenever you're ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: We sat down to a relaxing meal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a8
STRING: [Arie] “Well, I should get going. I wrote to Torta that I'd
be staying the night at Grandma's place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32d2
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, I'll walk with you. The city gets quite noisy
at night on Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32fa
STRING: [Arie] “I see, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x334c
STRING: [Chris] “What time do you leave tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x337e
STRING: [Arie] “Around nine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3394
STRING: [Chris] “I guess you don't want me to see you off?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33b2
STRING: [Arie] “No.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e0
STRING: Seeing you from the train would make me sad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33f6
STRING: For three years, we'd said our goodbyes here, on this
street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340c
STRING: It was because we'd feel lonely if we saw each other
again the next day... Apparently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3422
STRING: [Chris] “But this time, I'll see you again in just three
months, not a year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x345e
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3474
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: [Arie] “Ah... Nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c0
STRING: I may have said it in my letters, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e4
STRING: I'm a bit scared.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34fa
STRING: [Chris] “Of what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3518
STRING: [Arie] “You'll come back home after you're done, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x352e
STRING: [Chris] “You're a great help.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3560
STRING: [Arie] “Which means...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3576
STRING: Arie fell silent for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3582
STRING: We'd stopped in the middle of the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35aa
STRING: [Arie] “It's nothing. I was going to say something
strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c0
STRING: [Chris] “Now you'll have to say it, of course. What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e8
STRING: [Arie] “That means,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3616
STRING: I'll get to see you every day...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x363a
STRING: That's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3646
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... And?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3678
STRING: [Arie] “See, I said it would sound strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c0
STRING: [Arie] “I like that you don't care so much about those
things, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36d6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3708
STRING: [Arie] “Nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3736
STRING: ... Guess I'll see you in a few months?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374c
STRING: Arie turned around to face me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3760
STRING: [Arie] “Here is fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378e
STRING: If we draw this out, it's just going to make me even
sadder.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a4
STRING: [Chris] “...Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37d6
STRING: [Arie] “That's why I said here is fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37ec
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. Well, I'll see you soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x381e
STRING: [Arie] “Okay, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3838
STRING: This time, we'd only be apart for a few months.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3844
STRING: And there wasn't even time to start feeling sad, because
Arie had disappeared down the street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x385a
STRING: In any case, we were connected through our letters,
and we could meet again like this even in the short time
left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3870
STRING: As we always did...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x387c
STRING: Looking up at the starless sky, I wished that things
between us would stay the same, always.
